amendatorysection.catchline: Continuing education requirements; certified reports; central registry.
amendatorysection.para: Every law enforcement agency of the state or any of its political subdivisions shall send the director certified reports, on a form designed by the director, of the completion of the continuing education requirements by its law enforcement officers at such time and in such manner and detail as the director may prescribe. The director shall maintain a record of the reports in a central registry.
